column4: How do I install ATI/AMD fglrx proprietary driver on my laptop running on blackbuntu i386?
So I cant play SuperTuxKart at all
is blackbuntu a supported derivative
have you looked there yet
fglrx should work on it
have you looked in the Additional Drivers program to see if the driver is available
are you going to listen to me
what?
yup! I know I did it but it fails every single time I try to install it
I dont know Im using BlackBuntu
does it give an error message
yup Im gonna tell you
at your own risk, you can use the ATi installer from their site
http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/linux/Pages/radeon_linux.aspx
last time I did so my laptop wasn't displaying anything
tht's what i get: "SystemError: installArchives() failed"
strange bug
yes
wasn't a yes or no question
it was a YES
It is ATI own thing coz it's a proprietary driver and not open source
yup tht's real bullshit
i know that the thing in additional drivers is made by ati
